# Simple Counter

> Category: basic

A simple encrypted counter demonstrating FHE.add and FHE.sub

## Overview

This example demonstrates how to use FHEVM for simple counter.

## Prerequisites

- Node.js >= 18
- npm or yarn
- Basic understanding of Solidity and FHE concepts

## Installation

```bash
npm install
```

## Usage

### Compile contracts

```bash
npm run compile
```

### Run tests

```bash
npm run test
```
